mapper.insert: insert into sys_msg_template (tpl_no, tpl_title, busi_type, effect_dt, exp_dt, tpl_stat, cre_time, upd_time, tpl_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, tpl_cont ,tpl_type ) values (#{tplNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tplTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expDt,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tplStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tplDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tplCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tplType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update sys_msg_template set tpl_title = #{tplTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, busi_type = #{busiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effect_dt = #{effectDt,jdbcType=DATE}, exp_dt = #{expDt,jdbcType=DATE}, tpl_stat = #{tplStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cre_time = #{creTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tpl_desc = #{tplDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpl_cont = #{tplCont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tpl_type = #{tplType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tpl_no = #{tplNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select tpl_no, tpl_title, busi_type, effect_dt, exp_dt, tpl_stat, cre_time, upd_time, tpl_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, tpl_cont ,tpl_type from sys_msg_template where tpl_no = #{tplNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select tpl_no, tpl_title, busi_type, effect_dt, exp_dt, tpl_stat, cre_time, upd_time, tpl_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, tpl_cont from sys_msg_template

select tpl_no, tpl_title, busi_type, effect_dt, exp_dt, tpl_stat, cre_time, upd_time, tpl_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, tpl_cont ,tpl_type from sys_msg_template where 1=1
and tpl_no = #{tplNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and tpl_title like concat(concat('%', #{tplTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

select tpl_no, tpl_title, busi_type, effect_dt, exp_dt, tpl_stat, cre_time, upd_time, tpl_desc, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat, tpl_cont ,tpl_type from sys_msg_template where DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') between effect_dt and exp_dt

select t.* from sys_msg_template t,sys_msg_conf mc where mc.msg_template = t.tpl_no and t.tpl_no = #{tplNo} union all select t.* from sys_msg_template t,sys_auto_remind ar where ar.msg_template = t.tpl_no and t.tpl_no = #{tplNo} union all select t.* from sys_msg_template t,sys_remind_rule rr where rr.remind_tpl = t.tpl_no and t.tpl_no = #{tplNo}
